title: Jessica Biel dressed up as husband Justin Timberlake for Halloween
text:
After old footage surfaced of Jessica Biel admitting she was "not a huge fan" of NSYNC, the actress made up for dissing her husband, Justin Timberlake, in the best way possible.

For Halloween, Biel dressed up as the former boy band member himself, curly wig and all! Timberlake stood by her side as her microphone.

"This is what happens when you admit on TV that you don’t know any NSYNC songs and you’re married to @justintimberlake," she captioned the hilarious photo. "Well played, husband, well played."

In the footage from 1999, which was played while Biel appeared on "The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon," Biel can be heard saying, "To be honest, I don’t really listen … I mean, I know of them, of course, and I’ve heard of them, and I’ve heard the music -- I don’t think I own any of their CDs."

"I’m not a huge fan … but, I mean, cool, I guess," she adds.

No word on if channeling JT got Biel in on the NSYNC fan club.
